examples.example: 以后的日子里，我们要一起努力创造更美好的生活。

translate.english: In the days to come, we will work together to create a better life.

examples.example: 以后的人生道路还很长，我们要充满信心地走下去。

translate.english: The life path in the future is still very long, and we should go on with full confidence.

examples.example: 以后我会更加努力提升自己，让自己变得更加优秀。

translate.english: In the future, I will work harder to improve myself and make myself more excellent.
